info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Geauga, Lake, Ashtabula, Erie and Crawford Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Conneaut to near Geneva to Mentor. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Erie, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Meadville, Conneaut, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Edinboro, Geneva, Union City, Madison, Girard, North Kingsville, Cambridge Springs, Perry and Waterford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
